mapper.delete: delete from tbl_like where boardnum = #{boardnum} and membernum = #{membernum}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set likecnt = (select count(*) from tbl_like where boardnum = #{boardnum}) where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from( select b.boardnum, b.title, b.price, b.sell from tbl_like a join tbl_board b on a.boardnum = b.boardnum where a.membernum = #{membernum})
